summary:
Here is a summary of the key purpose and business terms of the contract in 3-5 bullet points:

• The contract is between Alpha Co and Beta LLC.
• Payment terms: payment is due within 30 days of invoice.
• Termination: either party may terminate the agreement with 60 days' written notice.
• Liability: liability is limited to $10,000.
• Confidentiality: parties agree to keep shared information confidential, except as required by law.

clauses.Termination: Either party may terminate this Agreement with 60 days' written notice.
clauses.PaymentTerms: Payment shall be made within 30 days of invoice.
clauses.Confidentiality: The parties agree to keep shared information confidential except as required by law.
